data.title: Still Denny's but apparently a new cook
data.text: We went for breakfast and had a rather blah experience. The service was absolutely GLACIAL. The wait staff was standing around waiting for food to come up. The customer coffee cups were drained without being refilled. Our Breakfast meal was served in four courses. First the coffee / tea, then the side dish of fruit, then the egg white omelet with the wrong toast, then the replacement toast after everything else had been consumed. The server blamed a new cook in the kitchen, but I don't see how that should impact the coffee service. You know the Denny's comment - never a half full cup of coffee at Denny's.

data.title: Breakfast from  paradise
data.text: They have very good cooks since the food is well prepare, taste very good, perfect flavor, not everybody prepare the French toast the same way and they do prepare a very good French toast, the employees are very nice too, place is clean

data.title: Please Review HR's Hiring Policy For Management/Servers!
data.text: Can the manager put down the newspaper he reads at the counter while guests are wondering where their food is?  Can the waitress overcome her inability to understand an order in English?  Does another waitress need to cover up the lack of training by bringing food sitting under a heat lamp for far too when she notices our server is overwhelmed with every aspect of waitressing?  The Denny's generated coupon brought a 7 minute delay when we attempted to pay our bill.  We would go back to this 24 hour location but Norm's is around the corner.  Their staff is head and shoulders better in performing their duties and giving attention to their patrons.

data.title: A good place for anyone!
data.text: You can always find something good to eat at Denny's. I love Fish & Chip, hamburgers, Salads, various breakfast items, etc.

data.title: Denny's Standard - Good things
data.text: We have breakfast here about twice a week, after a Physical Therapy session nearby. The food is good and a wide variety. Typical "Coffee Shop" atmosphere, and very kid friendly. Bathrooms are cleaned regularly and there is table, booth, and counter service. Service is sometimes "glacial" but it all gets there sometime.

data.title: Another Denny's
data.text:
It's seemingly difficult to get disappointed coming to one of these chain's location.
We needed a late night snack and stopped by for a quick hamburger. Nothing fancy
food wise, nothing fancy as far as decoration, comfort and ambience are concerned.
But then again, nothing disappointing.

data.title: Great service at night
data.text: Was just arriving to the city, late at night, was starving, and was the only place open. Very clean, great food and greater service, thanks guys!!!

data.title: Quick stop for a bite to eat
data.text: Remodeled inside and very nice. Staff is courteous but service a little slow as there weren't alot of customers in there . Some new choices on the menu.

data.title: Nice cheesecakes
data.text: It was an OK place. I just didn't like the rich kitchen smell which was making feel like everything around me is greasy. This place needs more cleanliness feeling. I really enjoyed the cheesecake.

data.title: Típico y muy bueno
data.text: Fuimos de casualidad por este abierto tarde, es un lugar típico donde se come muy pero muy bien, platos típicos abundantes y muy ricos, recomendable

data.title: el Peor dennys en el comí en USA!
data.text: La verdad ha es que ha pesar de contar con una buena atencion, me parecio que es el peor dennys en el que he comido, los baños estaban muy sucios y las limonadas no sabian bien tampoco, el unico motivo por el que comia aqui era porque me quedaba frente al hotel y la comida era pasable!

data.title: comida rápida y económica
data.text: Si no querés caer en Mc Donalds o Burger King, es una buena opción. Hay más variedad de platos y los postres son buenísimos!! Muy , muy económico, y si vas con chicos es lo ideal, porque el lugar es bien familiar y te atienden rápido.

data.title: Excelente comida
data.text: Mi restaurant favorito en US. La comida es de gran calidad y siempre está abierto.
